thread.title: Bill Nye hangs with Karlie Kloss, loves science in Netflix show trailer
thread.title_full: Bill Nye hangs with Karlie Kloss, loves science in Netflix show trailer

author: USA TODAY
title: Bill Nye hangs with Karlie Kloss, loves science in Netflix show trailer
text:
Bill Nye hangs with Karlie Kloss, loves science in Netflix show trailer Kelly Lawler , USA TODAY 9:33 a.m. ET Feb. 8, 2017 5 Shares 
The Science Guy is back. 
In addition to walking the runway at Men's Fashion Week or appearing in Super Bowl commercials , Bill Nye has been working to return science to our lives with his very own Netflix show, Bill Nye Saves the World . 
We got our first glimpse of the show in a trailer released at an event previewing Netflix's 2017 slate Wednesday, where Nye said the show will "address social issues from a scientific standpoint." Fans of the old Bill Nye the Science Guy will likely be excited. Saves the World has plenty of science, along with dancing, shouting and celebrity guests like Zach Braff and Tim Gunn. Oh and did we mention the show features Karlie Kloss as a correspondent? 
Watch the trailer below.
